comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
The cars look 1940s to me, and I think the Captain Cook Graving Dock at Garden Island is there (1944+).  Interesting to compare with this earlier view,  both from the roof of David Jones - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/4403060900/]

comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27331537@N06] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/32162360@N00] Photograph taken prior to 1950 as the line down King Street closed in 1950 and was replaced with  a balloon loop around the dear old lady in that year.
